languages.text: "Правосудие свершилось. Блюстители, арестовать всех менее значимых мятежников, они предстанут перед судом в свое время". {n}Голос Инцендии звучит величественно и властно, заставляя всех покорно опустить головы.{/n} "Благодарю тебя за помощь в очищении Футфола, {name}. Император защищает".

"Justice has been done. Enforcers, arrest all the lesser rebels. They will face trial in due course." {n}Incendia's voice is majestic and imperious, causing everyone to bow their heads in obedience.{/n} "Thank you for your aid in the cleansing of Footfall, {name}. The Emperor protects."
languages.original_text: "Правосудие свершилось. Блюстители, арестовать всех менее значимых мятежников, они предстанут перед судом в свое время". {n}Голос Инцендии звучит величественно и властно, заставляя всех покорно опустить головы.{/n} "Благодарю тебя за помощь в очищении Футфола, {name}. Император защищает".

"Justice has been done. Enforcers, arrest all the lesser rebels. They will face trial in due course." {n}Incendia's voice is majestic and imperious, causing everyone to bow their heads in obedience.{/n} "Thank you for your aid in the cleansing of Footfall, {name}. The Emperor protects."

languages.text: “正义得到了伸张，执法者已经逮捕了所有不成气候的叛徒。这些人也会在适当的时候接受审判。”{n}因森蒂娅的声音既傲慢，又不失威严，在场的所有人都恭顺地低下了头。{/n}“感谢你协助净化落脚港，{name}，愿帝皇保佑你。”
languages.original_text: "Justice has been done. Enforcers, arrest all the lesser rebels. They will face trial in due course." {n}Incendia's voice is majestic and imperious, causing everyone to bow their heads in obedience.{/n} "Thank you for your aid in the cleansing of Footfall, {name}. The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: “正义得到了伸张，执法者已经逮捕了所有不成气候的叛徒。这些人也会在适当的时候接受审判。”{n}因森蒂娅的声音既傲慢，又不失威严，在场的所有人都恭顺地低下了头。{/n}“感谢你协助净化落脚港，{name}，愿帝皇保佑你。”

languages.text: 「これは正義の行為だ。執行官は反乱軍を全員、逮捕せよ。彼らはやがて、裁判を受けるだろう」{n}インセンディアの堂々として横柄な声を聞いた者は皆、従順に頭を下げた。{/n} 「{name}、フットフォール浄化の援助に、感謝する。皇帝はお前たちを守るだろう」
languages.original_text: "Justice has been done. Enforcers, arrest all the lesser rebels. They will face trial in due course." {n}Incendia's voice is majestic and imperious, causing everyone to bow their heads in obedience.{/n} "Thank you for your aid in the cleansing of Footfall, {name}. The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: 「これは正義の行為だ。執行官は反乱軍を全員、逮捕せよ。彼らはその内、裁判を受けるだろう」{n}インセンディアの堂々として横柄な声を聞いた者は皆、従順に頭を下げた。{/n} 「{name}、フットフォール浄化の援助に、感謝する。皇帝はお前たちを守るだろう」

languages.text: «Se ha hecho justicia. El personal de seguridad arresta a todos los rebeldes menores. Serán juzgados a su debido tiempo». {n}La voz de Incendia es majestuosa e imperiosa, haciendo que todos inclinen sus cabezas en señal de obediencia.{/n} «Gracias por su ayuda en la limpieza de Paso, {name}. El Emperador protege».
languages.original_text: "Justice has been done. Enforcers, arrest all the lesser rebels. They will face trial in due course." {n}Incendia's voice is majestic and imperious, causing everyone to bow their heads in obedience.{/n} "Thank you for your aid in the cleansing of Footfall, {name}. The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha hecho justicia. El personal de seguridad arresta a todos los rebeldes menores. Serán juzgados a su debido tiempo». {n}La voz de Incendia es majestuosa e imperiosa, haciendo que todos inclinen sus cabezas en señal de obediencia.{/n} «Gracias por su ayuda en la limpieza de Paso, {name}. El Emperador protege».

languages.text: "Der Gerechtigkeit wurde genüge getan. Enforcers verhaften alle niederen Rebellen. Sie werden zu gegebener Zeit vor Gericht gestellt." {n}Incendias Stimme ist majestätisch und gebieterisch. Alle neigen gehorsam den Kopf.{/n} "Danke für Eure Hilfe bei der Säuberung von Footfall, {name}. Der Imperator schützt uns."
languages.original_text: "Justice has been done. Enforcers, arrest all the lesser rebels. They will face trial in due course." {n}Incendia's voice is majestic and imperious, causing everyone to bow their heads in obedience.{/n} "Thank you for your aid in the cleansing of Footfall, {name}. The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: "Der Gerechtigkeit wurde genüge getan. Enforcers verhaften alle niederen Rebellen. Sie werden zu gegebener Zeit vor Gericht gestellt." {n}Incendias Stimme ist majestätisch und gebieterisch. Alle neigen gehorsam den Kopf.{/n} "Danke für Eure Hilfe bei der Säuberung von Footfall, {name}. Der Imperator schützt uns."

languages.text: « Justice est faite. Prévôts, arrêtez tous les autres rebelles, ils seront jugés en temps utile. » {n}Impérieuse et pleine de majesté, la voix d'Incendia fait courber la tête à toute l'assemblée.{/n} « Merci pour votre aide lors de la purification de Castel, {name}. Que l'Empereur nous protège. »
languages.original_text: "Justice has been done. Enforcers, arrest all the lesser rebels. They will face trial in due course." {n}Incendia's voice is majestic and imperious, causing everyone to bow their heads in obedience.{/n} "Thank you for your aid in the cleansing of Footfall, {name}. The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: « Justice est faite. Prévôts, arrêtez tous les autres rebelles, ils seront jugés en temps utile. » {n}Impérieuse et pleine de majesté, la voix d'Incendia fait courber la tête à toute l'assemblée.{/n} « Merci de votre aide dans la purification de Castel, {name}. Que l'Empereur vous protège. »

languages.text: "Adalet yerini buldu. İnfazcılar, alt seviye isyancıları tutuklayın. Zamanı geldiğinde yargılanacaklar." {n}İncendia, heybetli ve otoriter sesiyle herkesin itaatkâr bir şekilde başını eğmesine neden oluyor.{/n} "Binlimanı arındırmaktaki desteğin için teşekkürler {name}. İmparator korur."
languages.original_text: "Justice has been done. Enforcers, arrest all the lesser rebels. They will face trial in due course." {n}Incendia's voice is majestic and imperious, causing everyone to bow their heads in obedience.{/n} "Thank you for your aid in the cleansing of Footfall, {name}. The Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: "Adalet yerini buldu. İnfazcılar, alt seviye isyancıları tutuklayın. İmparator korur."
